quoteText: If you provide Parsec with any feedback or suggestions regarding the Parsec Properties (“Feedback”), you hereby assign to Parsec all rights in such Feedback and agree that Parsec will have the right to use and fully exploit such Feedback and related information in any manner it deems appropriate. Parsec will treat any Feedback you provide to Parsec as non-confidential and non-proprietary. You agree that you will not submit to Parsec any information or ideas that you consider to be confidential or proprietary.
title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
